titleStmt.title: Whereas by an ordinance of Parliament of the 21 of Aprill 1648, it is ordered that the bursers and treasurers of the colledges in Oxford shall keep such monies as they have received ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: At head of text: Die Jovis 21. Septemb. 1648.

Printed with the following, at head of page: "May 22, 1648. At the Committee of Lords and Commons for reformation of the University of Oxford, resolved, that the monies received by the Bursers of such colledges wherein the Parliament hath placed new heads, shall be delivered to such heads, or such as they shall appoint to receive it."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
